item.description:
Charity Auction for Rosie's Place

Bid on an opportunity to donate to Rosie’s Place, a sanctuary for poor and homeless women in Boston. Boston AREIA especially supports this non-profit because of it’s dedication to prevention of homelessness and eviction. Their homelessness prevention initiatives, such as rental assistance and support services, provide families the help they need to stay in their homes.

If you donate to Rosie’s Place, you’ll get free real estate investing courses and bootcamps donated by national speakers and our own members!

Last year, BAREIA members raised over $8,000 for Rosie’s Place!


Monthly Meeting
6:30 PM, Thursday, July 15, 2010

Best Western, 380 Winter Street, Waltham, MA

free for members; only $25 for nonmembers

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association Monthly Meetup
